text: There are people in Germany that have Ukrainian ancestry. Around 250,000 of those live in Germany; Statistisches Bundesamt says that. Around 130,000 are Ukrainian citizens (in 2014). Famous people include: *Oleg Bryjak (d. 2015), singer *Andrew Witer (b. 1946), politician in Canada *Mariana Sadovska (b. 1972), actress, singer *Tanja Szewczenko, (b. 1977), figure skater ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Germany
title: Ukrainians in Germany
